title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Art of Embracing Failures in Serverless Architectures (DEV312)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 无服务器架构中拥抱失败的艺术 (DEV312)
abstract: Serverless architectures offer the immense power of distributed systems wrapped in irresistible simplicity. But that simplicity is an illusion. Explore hidden pitfalls in distributed systems and practical strategies to build resilience, illustrated with real-world examples using AWS Lambda and Amazon Kinesis. Above all, embrace failures. In the words of Dr. Werner Vogels: everything fails, all the time.
abstract_cn: 无服务器架构提供了分布式系统的巨大能力,并以不可抗拒的简单性呈现。但这种简单性是一种假象。探索分布式系统中的隐藏陷阱以及构建弹性的实用策略,并通过使用 AWS Lambda 和 Amazon Kinesis 的真实案例进行说明。最重要的是,拥抱失败。用 Werner Vogels 博士的话来说:一切都会失败,无时无刻。
